conbody.p: Certificates are required for to allow for trusted communication between and an application underlying a technical service, a payment service provider (PSP), an Identity Provider (IdP) or a Security Token Service (STS).
The following organizations are involved when using certificates:

ul.li: Technology providers integrating their applications with .
PSPs whose services are to be integrated with for invoicing and payment collection.
Organizations integrating an external process control system.
Any other organization using Web service calls to or from
